events.title: Story Time with Mrs. Smith
events.description: Join us for a fun-filled hour of listening to stories read by Mrs. Smith.

events.title: Preschool Field Trip to the Zoo
events.description: We're taking a trip to the zoo to learn about animals and their habitats.

events.title: Arts & Crafts Day
events.description: Join us for a day of creativity and imagination as we make beautiful art projects!

events.title: Sports Day
events.description: Get ready to run, jump, and play as we have a day filled with fun sports activities!

events.title: Preschool Picnic
events.description: Come enjoy a day in the park with your preschool friends and have a picnic together!

events.title: Music & Movement Class
events.description: Join us for a fun-filled hour of singing and dancing!

events.title: Science Experiment Day
events.description: Get ready to learn and discover as we conduct exciting science experiments!

events.title: Preschool Talent Show
events.description: Come show off your talents and let the preschool community see what you can do!

events.title: Halloween Party
events.description: Join us for a spooky and fun Halloween party, costumes encouraged!

events.title: Winter Wonderland Celebration
events.description: Get into the holiday spirit with our Winter Wonderland Celebration, complete with hot cocoa and festive activities!
